org.magdaaproject.utils
Class UnitConversionUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.magdaaproject.utils.UnitConversionUtils

public class UnitConversionUtils
extends java.lang.Object

a utility class which exposes utility methods for converting values between different scales

comvertTemperature

public static float comvertTemperature(float value,
                                       int fromScale,
                                       int toScale)
convert a temperature value from one scale to another

Parameters:
value - the temperature
fromScale - the scale to convert from, as defined by one of the temperature related constants in this class
toScale - the scale to convert to , as defined by one of the temperature related constants in this class
Returns:
the converted temperature
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - of the fromScale or toScale parameters are invalid
